SEARCH
Package io.github.lycoriscafe.nexus.http.core.headers.cookies

Class Cookie

java.lang.Object
io.github.lycoriscafe.nexus.http.core.headers.cookies.Cookie
public final class Cookie extends Object
Cookie for HTTP request/response. 
     
     // Example codes
     var cookie1 = new Cookie("MySweetCookie", "Yum Yum Yum");
     var cookie2 = new Cookie("MyAnotherCookie", "cookie!!!")
          .setMaxAge(3600L);
Since:
v1.0.0
See Also:
  • HttpRequest
  • HttpResponse
  • HTTP State Management Mechanism (rfc6265)

    • parseIncomingCookies

      public static List<Cookie> parseIncomingCookies(String headerValue)
      Process incoming cookies.
      Parameters:
      headerValue - Cookie header values came along with HttpRequest
      Returns:
      List of Cookie that come along with the request
      Since:
      v1.0.0
      See Also:
      • HttpRequest
      • Cookie
      API Note:
      This method is public but not useful for the API users. Only used for in-API tasks.

    • processOutgoingCookies

      public static String processOutgoingCookies(List<Cookie> cookies)
